title: Making up the Mind: How the Brain Creates Our Mental World
description:

Chris Frith, "Making up the Mind: How the Brain Creates Our Mental World"
English | 2007-05-07 | ISBN: 1405160225 | 247 pages | PDF | 3.93 mb

Written by one of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leading neuroscientists, Making Up the Mind is the first accessible account of experimental studies showing how the brain creates our mental world.

- Uses evidence from brain imaging, psychological experiments and studies of patients to explore the relationship between the mind and the brain
- Demonstrates that our knowledge of both the mental and physical comes to us through models created by our brain
- Shows how the brain makes communication of ideas from one mind to another possible
